componentDescription: A button that allows users to share content from the web application using the device's native sharing capabilities.

shareData.description: Specifies the data to be shared, conforming to the NavigatorShareData type.

label.description: Optional content to display inside the share button.

onShareStart.description: Callback function triggered when the share process is initiated.

onShareSuccess.description: Callback function invoked upon successful completion of the sharing action.

onShareCancel.description: Callback function executed if the user cancels the sharing operation.

onShareError.description: Callback function called if an error occurs during the sharing process.

onUnsupported.description: Callback function invoked if the Web Share API is not supported by the browser.

disableWhenUnsupported.description: If true, the button will be disabled when the Web Share API is not supported.

onClick.description: Optional click handler for the button, in addition to or instead of the default share behavior.
